scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma db reset
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
